name: Route
description: We request a road built to connect your capital to our city.

name: Clear Barbarian Camp
description: We feel threatened by a Xeno Hive near our city. Please take care of it.

name: Connect Resource
description: We want you to connect [tileResource] to your trade network, so that we both benefit.

name: Construct Wonder
description: We recommend you to start building [wonder] to show the whole world your colony's greatness.

name: Acquire Great Person
description: Great People can change the course of a Civilization! You will be rewarded for acquiring a new [greatPerson].

name: Conquer City State
description: It's time to erase the Outpost of [cityState] from the map. You will be greatly rewarded for conquering them!

name: Find Player
description: We have heard that [civName] had also set up their colony on this planet. We shall reward you for finding their territories.

name: Find Natural Wonder
description: Send your best explorers on a quest to discover Natural Wonders. Nobody knows the location of [naturalWonder] yet.

name: Give Gold
description: We are suffering great poverty after being robbed by [civName], and unless we receive a sum of Credits, it's only a matter of time before we collapse.

name: Pledge to Protect
description: We need your protection to stop the aggressions of [civName]. By signing a Pledge of Protection, you'll confirm the bond that ties us.

name: Contest Culture
description: The colony with the largest Culture growth will gain a reward.

name: Contest Faith
description: The colony with the largest Faith growth will gain a reward.

name: Contest Technologies
description: The colony with the largest number of new Technologies researched will gain a reward.

name: Invest
description: Our people are rejoicing thanks to a tourism boom. For a certain amount of time, any donation of Credits will yield [50]% extra Influence.

name: Bully City State
description: We are tired of the pretensions of [cityState]. If someone were to put them in their place by Demanding Tribute from them, they would be rewarded.

name: Denounce Civilization
description: We have been forced to pay tribute to [civName]! We need you to tell the world of their ill deeds.

name: Spread Religion
description: We have heard the tenets of [religionName] and are most curious. Will you send visionaries to teach us about your religion?
